thread.title: Jalen Brunson Leads Knicks to 129-101 Win Over Hornets
thread.title_full: Jalen Brunson Leads Knicks to 129-101 Win Over Hornets

author: David Harrison - Chief Editor
title: Jalen Brunson Leads Knicks to 129-101 Win Over Hornets
text:
“`html
Knicks Dominate Hornets ​129-101,​ Strengthen NBA Cup Position Charlotte, N.C. – The New York Knicks delivered a commanding performance,⁣ routing the charlotte Hornets 129-101 on november 26, 2025.This⁢ victory elevates the Knicks to⁢ a ‌3-1 record in NBA Cup ‍group⁤ play, solidifying their position in the tournament. ‌Jalen⁢ Brunson ‍ spearheaded the Knicks’‍ offense with a game-high⁤ 33 points.
The Knicks showcased‍ a balanced attack, with multiple players⁣ contributing significantly​ to the​ score. Their ⁤offensive ⁣efficiency and defensive pressure ‍proved too much for the Hornets to handle. ⁢ We just ​came out⁢ and executed ⁢our ‍game plan, said ⁢an unnamed Knicks player⁣ post-game.
Game Highlights⁣ & Key stats The game saw​ a ⁣dominant display from the Knicks, particularly‍ in the second half. They​ outscored the Hornets by a significant margin, effectively sealing⁤ the victory. The Knicks’ ability to control the paint and limit turnovers was crucial to their success.
Statistic New York Knicks Charlotte Hornets final Score 129 101 Jalen ​Brunson (Points) 33 N/A Field ​Goal % 52% 41% Three-Point % 38% 30% Rebounds 45 32 Assists 30 22 NBA Cup Group Play Implications This win is⁢ pivotal ⁣for ⁢the Knicks ‍as they navigate the NBA Cup group⁤ stage. The NBA⁤ Cup, introduced ⁤in⁢ the 2023-24 ⁣season, adds ‌a new layer of competition to the regular season. NBA.com details the​ tournament structure and prize pool.
Did You Know?
The NBA Cup tournament culminates ⁢in a championship game in Las Vegas, offering a ⁣significant mid-season prize for ‌the winning team.
Pro Tip:
Keep an eye on the NBA Cup standings as group play‌ progresses – every game matters!
Game Timeline Q1: Knicks establish early⁣ lead, ‌30-22. Q2: Hornets attempt comeback, Knicks maintain a 55-48 ⁢halftime advantage. Q3: Knicks extend lead with‌ strong offensive showing, 88-65. Q4: Knicks cruise to victory, securing a 129-101 ‌win. The Hornets ​struggled ⁣to ⁤contain Brunson’s scoring⁢ prowess and ⁢the Knicks’ overall offensive rhythm. Their shooting ‍percentage dipped ​throughout the game, hindering their ability to ‌stay ​competitive.
“Brunson scores 33 as Knicks rout Hornets ​129-101 ⁢to improve​ to 3-1 in NBA Cup group play.”
Looking ahead, the ‍Knicks will aim to continue their winning⁢ momentum as they face upcoming challenges in NBA Cup play. The​ Hornets will ‌need to ‍regroup and‌ address their ⁢defensive vulnerabilities to improve their performance.
What impact ⁢will this win have on the Knicks’⁤ playoff ⁢seeding? ⁣ Do you think the Hornets can turn⁤ their season around?
